docs.snippet: The Hall of Fame voting brought up an inadvertent point: members of the news media should not be involved in selecting honors for the sports they cover....

headline.main: Get the Media Out of the Honoring Business

docs.snippet: In a stunning rejection of the steroid era, no players were elected into the Baseball Hall of Fame....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a stunning rejection of the steroid era, no players were elected into the Baseball Hall of Fame.
docs.abstract: Editorial on no players being elected into Baseball Hall of Fame; contends that resounding rejection of even Barry Bonds and Roger Clemens--two of baseball's all-time best--is part of legacy of steroids in baseball, and transition away from steroids era will be faster if its taint is kept out of Hall of Fame.

docs.snippet: Craig Biggio said he might have been bypassed for the Hall of Fame because he was on the ballot for the first time with several stars linked to performance-enhancing drugs...
docs.lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio said he might have been bypassed for the Hall of Fame because he was on the ballot for the first time with several stars linked to performance-enhancing drugs
docs.abstract: Former Major League Baseball player Craig Biggio says he may have been bypassed for Baseball Hall of Fame because he was on ballot for first time with several stars linked to performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.seo: Craig Biggio Cites Drug Issue in Hall of Fame Vote
headline.main: Biggio Cites Drug Issue in Hall Vote
